jd: Greetings from Sligo Software Solutions, Inc. !!SLIGO is a Software Development & IT Consulting company. We have around 100+ IT associates working with our esteemed clients across several domains such as IT, Banking, Healthcare, and Government. We have an urgent requirement for Peoplesoft Business Analyst position with our client. Role: Peoplesoft Business AnalystLocation: Albany, New YorkDuration: 20 MonthsJob ID: SLG - 19 - 9863Client: NY StateRespond by Date: 09/26/24 5:00 PM Description The candidate will serve as an Information Technology (IT) Specialist in the Program Optimization Support and Transformation (POST) bureau to support the New York State and Local Retirement System (NYSLRS) PeopleSoft system functional areas and bureau users.Duties Document and categorize existing business processes.Compose and review business system documentation.Assist with the communication of business process and system requirements to IT staff and other stakeholders.Utilize established business processes and technology to identify, analyze, and solve production problems/issues.Review and analyze business process deficiencies requiring resolution during or after implementation.Perform configuration analysis to determine the most efficient way to migrate system changes.Work with stakeholders to design and develop deployment plans that allow for the effective and efficient implementation of all new business processes and system components.Facilitate the execution of deployment plans.Create tickets in a ticket management system, determine the priority and severity of reported incidents, reassigning to support teams and overseeing that incidents are resolved in a timely manner.Work with business and technical staff to analyze any problems identified during the deployment process and develop solutions that effectively address those problems.Work directly with operational bureau managers and staff in order to facilitate, coordinate and complete the numerous activities required as business owners of the Deployment Phase of the System Development Life Cycle.Mandatory Requirements Experience (10+ Years)Works in the field of Information Technology, experienced in the usage and support of a collection of development platforms, technical architectures or business applications and products that run on those platforms - beyond that of a Programmer.Requirements This is an 100% Remote72 months of Information Technology experience in at least five of the following areas:Liaison with functional users and managementRequirements GatheringConfiguration ManagementRelease Management and DeploymentTroubleshooting and DebuggingFunctional Documentation and DesignPost Implementation System MonitoringSoftware Development Lifecycle Planning72 months experience performing configuration-based analysis in one or more of the following PeopleSoft modules CRM, HCM, FIN & IB.72 months of experience participating in event intake, triage, incident response, escalation of incidents and stakeholder communications. 72 months of experience in deployment and release management, including: data analysis of object contention and configuration lists.48 months’ experience creating and maintaining standardized reports for executives and senior management.48 months of experience in Change Management in the course of fulfilling user requests, resolving incidents, and meeting operational commitments.48 months of experience developing procedures, standards, workflows, documentation and visualizations.
